pages.text: $(2)This entry is about pre-hardmode walkthrough. $(d)If you are in casual mode, you don't need this guide because casual mode has no limit of game stages. $()$(li)First, get a diamond and begin to set up your botania stuff to make a $(3)Mana Diamond$(), which can be further made into a $(d)Twilight Gem$(). Throw the twilight gem into a Twilight Forest portal to go into the Twilight Forest.
Throw a $(d)Twilight Gem$() into the water to activate the portal. Poppy can be replaced with any flower, sapling or tall grass.

Next, follow the Twilight Forest walkthrough and defeat every boss possible, until you craft a $(d)Twilight Shield$(). With it, you can go into $(5)The Nether$(). $(c)Note: crafting recipes below might vary depending on your packmode.$()
Imagine not knowing how to build this in 2021.

Next, follow the $(3)Abyssalcraft$() walkthrough until you defeat $(4)Asorah, The Fallen$() and obtain $(3)Eye of the Abyss$(). Then keep progressing on Botania until you defeat Gaia. After crafting a $(3)Awakened Eye$(), you can summon the Wither and slay it. $(br)About more detailed guide on Abyssalcraft, read $(2)Necronomicon$() which can be found in your Omnipedia. Note: The T-shaped soul sand structure may not contain other blocks in the down left and down right corners.

Next you're gonna go into $(6)The Aether$() and defeat $(6)Valkyrie$(), craft a $(6)Bravery Certificate$() to go into $(4)Dreadlands$() and obtain $(4)Dreadium Ingots$(). After completing both routes, you can then craft a $(3)Ender Charm$() and enter The End. $(8)(If you selected a map preset that does not contain structures, like space spheres or floating islands, you can craft end portal frames)$(), See the '$(c)Hardmode$()' entry for what to do after defeating Ender Dragon.
Build the frame and pour water in it! (Must be vanilla water bucket)
